meaningMnemonic: A <radical>leader</radical> is wearing a <radical>lid</radical> and is standing outside in <radical>winter</radical>. Plus it's raining and she's covered in <radical>drop</radical>s of water. On top of all this, it's <kanji>night</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Question is, what is she protecting them from during the <kanji>night</kanji>? Turns out, it's the <reading>Ya</reading>nkees (や) baseball team. They're out for blood, and only the leader can protect us.
